title: JR Pass vs. Single Tickets
description: The JR Pass price increased in 2023. Unless you are traveling long distances daily, single tickets or regional passes are often cheaper.

title: Robot Restaurant
description: Often cited as overpriced and lacking authentic culture.

title: Convenience Store Etiquette
description: Don't eat while walking. Use the recycling bins correctly. Staff are helpful but busy.
